name: The Theater
description: A fun sport climbing spot next to the road with several good routes up to 5.12.

name: Elevator Wave
description: A fun small wave to surf on the Colorado River good between 2000-2800 cfs.

name: Dead Dog
description: Great hole to play on between 11,000-13,000 cfs. A park and play spot with easy eddy access river right.

name: White's Rapid
description: A fun class III rapid on the Colorado River.

name: Dome Plateau
description: One of the best jumps in Moab. 1900' overall with a sweet terrain line to fly.

name: Tombstone
description: One of the most popular BASE jumps in Moab. 400' with a great lanindng and close to home!

name: Kens Lake
description: A good ridge soaring spot and you can cross-country from in the right conditions.

name: Gold Knob
description: A great hike with a great view of the La Sal Mountains. 1,600' elevation gain and an amazing paraglidinging launch spot.

name: Lower Ahab
description: My favorite downhill trail section in Moab in my opinion.
